configMapName.description: The name of the ConfigMap that contains configuration files for this extension

customizationUri.description: HTTP URI to download the extension customizations from (as .zip file).

enabled.description: Whether this extension should be enabled

extensionPriority.description: Configures the priority value in the hivemq_extension.xml.

extensionStartPriority.description: Configures the start-priority value in the hivemq_extension.xml.

extensionUri.description: HTTP URI to download the extension from (as .zip distribution). Set to 'preinstalled' if the extension to be managed is statically built into the container.

id.description: Unique, descriptive id for the extension folder

requestHeaderSecretName.description: The name of the Secret that contains headers, that should be used for the download of custom extensions.

secretName.description: The name of the Secret that contains configuration files for this extension

skipHttpsCertificateValidation.description: Configures if the HTTPs certificate validation should be skipped for extension and customization downloads.

skipHttpsHostnameVerification.description: Configures if the HTTPs hostname verification should be skipped for extension and customization downloads.

supportsHotReload.description: Whether this extension supports hot-reload of configuration changes

crdVersion.description: The CRD version this custom resource was created with

healthDetails.description: Human readable details of the current health status

healthStatus.description: The aggregated health status of the HiveMQ Platform

platformReplicas.description: Current desired number of HiveMQ Platform replicas

reconciliationRequests.description: [DEPRECATED since HiveMQ Platform Operator 2.0.0] Requests for state changes in the next reconciliation

recoveryInformation.description: Recovery information for the ERROR state

message.description: A human readable recovery state message

state.description: The recovery state of the deployment, used to restore the current state

statePhase.description: The recovery state phase, indicating the step of the recovery reconciliation state

restartExtensions.description: [DEPRECATED since HiveMQ Platform Operator 2.0.0] The extensions to be restarted

state.description: The current state of the reconciliation

statePhase.description: The current state phase, indicating the current step of the reconciliation state
